item.title: About
item.description:
< Hey there! I’m Nathan.

You’re wondering what GDquest is all about? You came to the right place. GDquest stands for Game Design Quest. It is a Youtube channel about game creation, a growing community, and a company focused on open source technologies.

On GDquest, you’ll find:

  1. Dozens of free game design tutorials
  2. Many Open source game assets.
  3. A lovely community of game creation enthusiasts.

Me? I’m Nathan!

I’m a game designer and a tutor. I release free tutorials weekly on Youtube. I make game art, and I create premium training series like Game Art Quest.

But I’m not alone!

I work with 3 experienced collaborators:

  1. Arthur Shefer, the author of the open source game engine meta2d.
  2. MagicFred, a senior 2d game artist with a unique, cute art style.
  3. Cl√©ment Brard, a Unity developer and the author of Lord of the Dungeon, a role playing game.
